about_the_game:
Chaos Bringer is a solo-play, party-based RPG featuring real-time combat with pause. Queue skills on a timeline for strategic battles. Enjoy dungeon crawling and MMORPG-style raid bosses utilizing DPS and threat meter. Grow your heroes through special gear drops and city-specific crafting systems.

Enjoy MMORPG-like Raid Bosses for Solo Players, Free from Social Stress

A variety of boss patterns and strategies are prepared for you!

Engage in epic, multi-phase battles that challenge your tactical skills and party management.

Experience a More Strategic and Dynamic Combat

  • Multi-lane Timeline System

Queue skills on a multi-lane timeline for each hero, offering a more strategic and dynamic battle experience.

Pause anytime to adjust your strategy and manage your party of up to 8 heroes.

  • TPS and DPS meters

Monitor real-time DPS (Damage Per Second) and TPS (Threat Per Second) to optimize your party's performance and keep boss attention on your tanks.

Strategically manage the roles of tanks, healers, and DPS to maximize efficiency and survive intense battles.

Enjoy a Smooth and Fun Experience with Intuitive Stats and Class-Specific Skills

There are various types of stats that can satisfy RPG players. However, it remains very straightforward due to its high intuitiveness. Players can also check the stats of their opponents by selecting a target.

Fill the hotkeys with a variety of class-specific skills. You can easily view and use them with a keyboard-shaped layout for quick reference.

Enjoy Roguelike-Inspired Dungeon Crawling

Switch to auto-resume mode for a combat experience that feels like a traditional roguelike turn-based system. You can fast-forward time during combat, creating a quick-paced flow that condenses the 3D action, so players who enjoyed classic 2D roguelikes won’t feel the gameplay is too slow or drawn out.

Gear and Crafting Systems

Strengthen your heroes with special raid gear drops and utilize a unique city-influenced crafting system.

Collect and complete set items for powerful bonuses as you progress through the game.

Dive into the world of Chaos Bringer and experience the excitement of MMORPG raids in a single-player environment!
